It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifndef PB_DS_BINARY_HEAP_ENTRY_PRED_HPP 42 #define PB_DS_BINARY_HEAP_ENTRY_PRED_HPP 43 44 namespace __gnu_pbds 45 { 46 namespace detail 47 { 49 template<typename _VTp, typename Pred, typename _Alloc, bool No_Throw> 50 struct entry_pred; 51 53 template<typename _VTp, typename Pred, typename _Alloc> 54 struct entry_pred<_VTp, Pred, _Alloc, true> 55 { 56 typedef Pred type; 57 }; 58 60 template<typename _VTp, typename Pred, typename _Alloc> 61 struct entry_pred<_VTp, Pred, _Alloc, false> 62 { 63 private: 64 typedef rebind_traits<_Alloc, _VTp> __rebind_v; 65 66 public: 67 typedef typename __rebind_v::const_pointer entry; 68 69 struct type : public Pred 70 { 71 inline 72 type() { } 73 74 inline 75 type(const Pred& other) : Pred(other) { } 76 77 inline bool 78 operator()(entry p_v) const 79 { return Pred::operator()(*p_v); } 80 }; 81 }; 82 } // namespace detail 83 } // namespace __gnu_pbds 84 85 #endif // #ifndef PB_DS_BINARY_HEAP_ENTRY_PRED_HPP
